item.title: On going problem!!!, 12th June
item.description:
I had not reported a single thing for many months, as I felt this was going nowhere. But now, I am having regular viewers to potential buyers for my flat, and I have to report this day by day (it's that regular), so that I can minimise rejections due to external factors. Please work with me, please!! My next viewer is coming, Saturday 14th June. Please help!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Conduction workers outside permissible hours, 12th June
item.description:

item.title: Broken Glass, 12th June
item.description:
Raised this issue before and it was closed and marked as complete but it hasnâ€™t been fixed. There is so much broken glass along the curb and pavement on the small alleyway from Sainsburys to Burrell Row and around the electricity substations. This is never cleared and is a hazard to dogs and children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 181, High Street, Beckenham, London
